Title: Sample VariableSizedWrapGrid Windows Phone
Description: This example gives an idea of ​​how to make the size of a list item dynamically. In this case a user control that has been created by VariableSizedWrapGrid kinn
HomeWiki:
This example gives an idea of ​​how to make the size of a list item dynamically. In this case a user control that has been created by VariableSizedWrapGrid kinnara (https://github.com/Kinnara).

Flickr is an API used to create this example. Each image is obtained dynamically displayed.
